scripts.watch: concurrently -c red,green,blue,yellow,magenta,cyan,bgRed -n swl,csv,json,sqlite,xlsx,postgres,clion 'cd swl && npm run watch' 'cd swl.csv && npm run watch' 'cd swl.json && npm run watch' 'cd swl.sqlite && npm run watch' 'cd swl.xlsx && npm run watch' 'cd swl.postgres && npm run watch' 'cd clion && npm run watch'
scripts.build: for dir in clion swl* ; do (cd $dir && tsc) ; done
